mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO chat_message ( message_id, room_id, sender_id, receiver_id, content, status, type, ipAddress, timestamp , metadata ) VALUES
( #{msg.messageId}, #{msg.room.roomId}, #{msg.senderId}, #{msg.receiverId}, #{msg.content}, #{msg.status}, #{msg.type}, #{msg.ipAddress}, #{msg.timestamp}, #{msg.metadata, typeHandler=com.api.chat.entity.handler.MapObjectJsonTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT cm.message_id, cm.sender_id, cm.receiver_id, cm.content, cm.status, cm.type, cm.timestamp, cm.metadata, cr.room_id, cr.room_name, cr.room_avatar, cr.room_status, cr.room_type, cr.created_at, cr.room_description FROM chat_message cm LEFT JOIN chat_room cr ON cm.room_id = cr.room_id WHERE cm.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY cm.timestamp DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
